hints.content:
Let's look at each number one at a time.  

$\purpleD{600}+\blueE{90}+\maroonD3$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD6\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{600}\\\\
\blueE9\text{ tens} &=\blueE{90}\\\\
\maroonD3\text{ ones} &=\maroonD3
\end{align}$

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD6$ | $\blueE9$ | $\maroonD3$


$\purpleD{600}+\blueE{90}+\maroonD3=\purpleD{6}\blueE{9}\maroonD3$

$\purpleD{600}+\blueE{30}+\maroonD9$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD6\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{600}\\\\
\blueE3\text{ tens} &=\blueE{30}\\\\
\maroonD9\text{ ones} &=\maroonD9
\end{align}$

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD6$ | $\blueE3$ | $\maroonD9$

$\purpleD{600}+\blueE{30}+\maroonD9=\purpleD{6}\blueE{3}\maroonD9$

$\purpleD{300}+\blueE{60}+\maroonD9$

$\begin{align}
\purpleD3\text{ hundreds} &=\purpleD{300}\\\\
\blueE6\text{ tens} &=\blueE{60}\\\\
\maroonD9\text{ ones} &=\maroonD9
\end{align}$

Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD3$ | $\blueE6$ | $\maroonD9$

$\purpleD{300}+\blueE{60}+\maroonD9=\purpleD3\blueE6\maroonD9$

Here is the completed table:

Expanded form | Number
:-: | :-: | -
$600+90+3$ | $693$
$600+ 30 + 9$ | $639$
$300+60+9$ | $369$

question.content:
**Match each number to its expanded form.**
